page.title: 09RECREATION_SWIMMING
page.content: Perranporth is a very popular beach for swimming and surfing.However you must be wary of possible dangers,such as weaver fish,jelly fish and rough tides.Also obey the flags at all times.There is a local surf club who mount regular patrols and carry out any needed rescues.Over at Droskyn Point there is a rock pool but it is not very clean or tidy and there is too much sand in it. There are some swimming pools in Perranporth.One is situated in the Ponsmere Hotel,one in the Bamboo Club and one at Chapel Rock,but this is small and best for little children or beginners.One very large pool is on the holiday camp at Perran Sands but this is only open to residents.
